<rule id="springboot-jpa-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <!-- Spring component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-data-jpa" groupId="org.springframework.data"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring Boot component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-data-jpa" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring component in compiled application condition -->
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-data-jpa" groupId="org.springframework.data"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the SpringBoot Data JPA artifact with Quarkus 'spring-data-jpa' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the SpringBoot JPA artifact with Quarkus `spring-data-jpa` extension

                        Spring Data JPA is in spring-data-jpa artifact brought transitively by any `org.springframework.data:spring-data-*` dependency  
                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-data-jpa`
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-data-jpa" title="Quarkus JPA Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
